definition: not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°

sentences.english: They were nearly four times as likely to live long after bypass surgery as were the unmarried.
sentences.chinese: 她們搭橋手術後的存活率幾乎是未婚者的4倍。

sentences.english: It's for the British prince and his fiancee.
sentences.chinese: 這是英國王子和他的未婚妻。

sentences.english: He left his Montana ranch to his spinster sister.
sentences.chinese: 他把他在蒙大拿州的大牧場留給了他未婚妹妹。

sentences.english: They both bewailed their misfortune at being young, unmarried returned students.
sentences.chinese: 兩人慨嘆不幸身爲青年未婚留學生的麻煩。

sentences.english: In 2009, that was true of almost half in that age group.
sentences.chinese: 在2009年，同樣的年齡組中幾乎有一半人未婚。

sentences.english: Co-habitation prior to marriage may exert a series of distressing effects.
sentences.chinese: 未婚同居產生了一系列令人擔憂的後果。

sentences.english: The out-of-wedlock birth rate rose by a sharp 7 percent last year.
sentences.chinese: 未婚生育率較去年上升了整整7%。

sentences.english: For Wang Shuang and his fiancée, both turning 24, there was an additional complication.
sentences.chinese: 王雙和他的未婚妻都快24歲了，他們另有麻煩。

sentences.english: The people who benefited the most were singles and empty-nesters.
sentences.chinese: 受惠最多的是未婚者和子女不在身邊的人。

sentences.english: Meantime, the number of unmarried cohabiting couples has grown tenfold, the census shows.
sentences.chinese: 同時未婚同居的情侶增加了10倍。

sentences.english: In 1986, one in four people ages 25 to 29 had never married.
sentences.chinese: 在1986年，四分之一人在25至29歲之間未婚。

sentences.english: Bai Zhou is summer dream for future husband.
sentences.chinese: 白宙是夏夢尋的未婚夫。

sentences.english: I'm Liu from China, a teacher of English, with a wonderful salary, unmarried.
sentences.chinese: 我是來自中國的劉，英語教師，收入頗豐，未婚。

sentences.english: The people who benefited the most were singles and empty- nesters .
sentences.chinese: 受惠最多的是未婚者和子女不在身邊的人。

sentences.english: Let's say that you are meeting your fiance's parents.
sentences.chinese: 假設你要與未婚夫的父母見面。

sentences.english: My grandfather has been to the paradise last year, at the same date.
sentences.chinese: 所有未婚大齡女青年都該去看一下這部電影。

definition: older (than average in a group, at school, for marriage etc)
length of married life/marriageable age/actual marrying age
to marry for the second time/second marriage/second spouse
to give birth to a child or children
to get married and have kids/to start a family
